The Social Universe covers cutting edge methods that catapult your business or personal branding into the world of Social Media Marketing. Unlock the Mysteries of the Social Universe as we discuss powerful emerging trends that help you advertise effectively while connecting deeply with customers on local, national, and global fronts. The fastest growing and most powerful marketing tools are found in the Social Media, whether you target local neighborhoods using platforms like Trusted Team and  LocalBlox, or globally using Facebook, LinkedIn, YouTube, or Twitter. With hundreds of platforms emerging daily, the Secrets of the Social Universe can be used to give a dominant personal or business lift during this current economy. The Social Universe will share details regarding cutting edge practices to integrate the use of Social Media, Traditional Media, and Professional Networking to increase your personal and business revenue. The Social Universe airs Tuesdays at 2 PM Pacific on VoiceAmerica Business.

I belong to a dominating referral network that can be accessed by invitation only, and which interacts well with LinkedIn members. After reviewing my profile, if you are interested in joining our group as my direct referral partner, please click Kurt.TrustedTeam.com/start.Cost Consulting: My Trusted Team referral partners act as a business consulting team to reduce clients' overhead costs in order to free up needed budget for revenue generating endeavors provided by my Trusted Consulting Team members. We usually begin by reducing clients’ phone/internet bills by approximately 30%, and then move on to reducing other overhead costs using the services of our Trusted Consulting Team members. These cost savings can then be redirected to revenue generating areas, such as web marketing, where our Trusted Consulting Team members are ranked in the top 20 in the nation, and client increases in web traffic and resulting revenue increases can range from 100% to 1,000%.Marketing my Trusted Team: I market my qualified Trusted Consulting Team members heavily to our nationwide opt-in database of 4 million businesses, to my personal “Arizona-centric” database of 15,000 businesses that I have talked to individually in person over the past 15 years, and to my Social Media that currently has over 50,000 individual members, well over 500,000 YouTube Viewers.

During my tenure with Move, Inc. Al was one of the most inspiring and motivational leaders I have ever known. He knew how to push our team to our highest limits of achievement, and was so supportive about each of us as individuals. He cared about each person on his team, and their well-being both at work and in their personal lives as well. Al has limitless strength and vision in team building, in particular in the inside sales arena, and knows how to locate and hire talented team members.  He is also the best I've seen in developing and training those talented individuals to reach their maximum potential.  Whether you have the chance to work with Al as a member of his team, or as someone who works side by side with him as a colleague, it is an honor in all capacities.

summary: I host the Social Universe and Ageless Living Talk Shows on Voice America, with my share of Voice America's 5 million listeners.  The Social Universe Talk Show covers the applied use of Social Media by actual business owners that have found success utilizing Social Media techniques, and insight for our listeners to capitalize on the strengths of the Social Media for their own businesses. Approximately 25% of our content is regarding Professional Networking, and how to use Social Media platforms to enhance professional networking.  One particular platform we actively use for our own clients and referral partners is Trusted Team, which has increased our referral generation by 3,000%...no, that is not a typo.  Our consulting offers our Trusted Team members a nationwide voice by bringing them as guests on Voice America. We also film the interview, and our guests often receive from 20,000 to 30,000 viewers of the show on YouTube. We offer the option to be a guest on our show to ANY referral partner that gives us five qualified referrals that need daily deals programs, advertising, Social Media, or  web marketing. The Social Universe YouTube channel was recently ranked as one of the top 25 most influential Social Media channels on YouTube worldwide. It was an honor to be ranked alongside LinkedIn and Hoot Suites' YouTube channels. Cost Consulting: My referral partners and I act as a business consulting team to reduce clients' overhead costs in order to free up needed budget for revenue generating endeavors provided by my Trusted Consulting Team members. As for me, have over 15 years of sales experience with a strong record demonstrating award-winning sales leadership in highly competitive markets, and demonstrable high level multimillion-dollar increases in sales.  I am adept at driving corporate growth and revenues, while improving team environments and heightening sales performance.
